DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Efficacy And Safety Of Varenicline Compared To Placebo For Smoking Cessation Through Reduction
DOC.criteria: Male female cigarette smoker age 18 year willing/able quit smoking within next month willing attempt reduce smoke work toward quit attempt within next 3 month . Subjects must smoke average least 10 cigarette per day past year month prior screen visit , continuous period abstinence great 3 month past year exhale carbon monoxide ( CO ) > 10 ppm screening . Subjects mild moderate depression anxiety may include condition stable . Subjects history suicide attempt suicidal behavior past two year . Subjects severe depression anxiety . Subjects psychosis , panic disorder , bipolar disorder , post traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) , schizophrenia . Subjects alcohol substance abuse dependence ( except nicotine ) unless full remission least 12 month .
